title: Everything we know about Liam Hemsworth’s new love
text:
Everything we know about Liam Hemsworth’s new love

Cape Town - Liam Hemsworth seems to have moved on from Miley Cyrus.

Just months after tying the knot with the singer, the 29-year-old filed for divorce citing irreconcilable differences.

And now he seems to be moving on with actress and model, Maddison Brown, Metro reported.

Following Miley’s social media PDA with her new Aussie boyfriend, singer Cody Simpson, it’s been reported Liam has been spending time with the Australian actress.

According to Cosmopolitan, the 22-year-old was a child actress who starred in the 2004 movie Go Big and also in the remake of TV series Dynasty in 2017.

It’s alleged she was pursued by Liam who’s "so into" her, Us Weekly reported.

"Spending time with Maddison has been natural, fun and easy for Liam," an insider revealed.

Another source said the duo were taking it slow. "It’s very new. Liam is taking it slow but he’s definitely interested in her," revealed the insider, People reported.

(Sources: Metro, Cosmopolitan, Us Weekly, People, Instagram)
description: Liam Hemsworth seems to have moved on from Miley.
